roleset.name: take away funding
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, comparison to 'fund'. No VNcls.

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: You are unwitting participants to the oldest Shock Doctrine trick in the book - defund popular social programs so that eventually they become dysfunctional and that 's used as an excuse to get rid of or privatize it .
example.arg: so that eventually they become dysfunctional and that's used as an excuse to get rid of or privateize it
